metadata.synopsis: Dialogue with the main guard in the Undercellar Entrance, where the player can try to detect what are they guarding and convince them to allow access.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interacting with the character at -1690; 12; 574 or activating the trigger located at -1688; 14; 575

27.speaker: Tusgront
27.text: Did I whisper? I said GET LOST.
27.context: NodeContext: Threatening, spelling out "Get Lost" like he's speaking to an idiot

29.speaker: Tusgront
29.text: I said you could come in. Didn't say you could leave.
29.context: NodeContext: With a smile - about to have some fun

118.speaker: Tusgront
118.text: Boss doesn't like outsiders sniffing around.
118.context: NodeContext: With a smile - about to have some fun

64.speaker: Tusgront
64.text: Shouldn't go wandering in dark alleys. Very dangerous hobby. Gets people killed.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Big and imposing hereNodeContext: Scolding

96.speaker: Player
96.text: It is true. Boo has slain many who have greeted him so impolitely.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

126.speaker: Minsc
126.text: It is true. Boo has slain many who have greeted him so impolitely.
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Oh, but surely we're safe with one of Nine-Fingers' big strapping boys to protect us.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

100.speaker: Player
100.text: Oh, but surely we're safe with one of Nine-Fingers' big strapping boys to protect us.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

17.speaker: Jaheira
17.text: Oh, but surely we're safe with one of Nine-Fingers' big strapping boys to protect us.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

130.speaker: Jaheira
130.text: That's her sigil on your ring, is it not?
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

62.speaker: Player
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

15.speaker: Tusgront
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

107.speaker: Player
107.text: *On the half-orc's finger, you notice an unusual ring: heavy, and with a strange symbol carved on its surface.*
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

32.speaker: Tusgront
32.text: *On the half-orc's finger, you notice an unusual ring: heavy, and with a strange symbol carved on its surface.*
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: *On the half-orc's finger, you notice an unusual ring: heavy, and with a strange symbol carved on its surface.*
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot on orc's hand, ring visible

31.text: Scuttle away, lizard. Before I cut off your tail.
31.context:
NodeContext: Menacing. 
"dglinkarz" = glin-KARZ (roughly equal emphasis on both syllables, with a strong k to start the second syllable. "Karz"  like "cars", but elongating the a and z).  
"Gubuk" - GU-buk (Both "u"s as in "push"/"look"/"book"). 
"Nothrakash" - noth-RAK-ash (Harsh, slightly rolled "r".)

128.speaker: Tusgront
128.text: Scurry away, gubuk. Before I crush you.
128.context:
NodeContext: Menacing. 
"dglinkarz" = glin-KARZ (roughly equal emphasis on both syllables, with a strong k to start the second syllable. "Karz"  like "cars", but elongating the a and z).  
"Gubuk" - GU-buk (Both "u"s as in "push"/"look"/"book"). 
"Nothrakash" - noth-RAK-ash (Harsh, slightly rolled "r".)

135.speaker: Player
135.text: What's with that strange wall over there? Is that what you're guarding?
135.context: NodeContext: shouted, getting the attention of the other guards a few metres away

104.speaker: Tusgront
104.text: Sneaking into MY ALLEY?! Nobody sneaks into MY ALLEY!
104.context: NodeContext: shouted, getting the attention of the other guards a few metres away

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I found this strange ring. Do you know anything about it?

81.speaker: Player
81.text: I just want a quick look around. Where's the harm?

60.speaker: Tusgront
60.text: Harm can be anywhere you like - nose, kneecaps, fingernails...

127.speaker: Player
127.text: I came by earlier and lost something. I just want to retrieve it.

58.speaker: Tusgront
58.text: Something valuable? Then you must get it back.

84.speaker: Tusgront
84.text: Something valuable? Then you must get it back.

39.text: Lot of people lose things in this alley. Like their LIVES.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Threatening, thinks he's being very witty

50.speaker: Tusgront
50.text: Lot of people lose things in this alley. Like their LIVES.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Threatening, thinks he's being very witty

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Are those your final words? Usually people scream for their mothers.
106.context: NodeContext: Calming you, with a smile - he doesn't think you're fearsome at all

20.speaker: Tusgront
20.text: Peace, peace. Fearsome individuals always welcome in Tusgront's alley.
20.context: NodeContext: Calming you, with a smile - he doesn't think you're fearsome at all

69.speaker: Tusgront
69.text: Peace, peace. Fearsome individuals always welcome in Tusgront's alley.
69.context: NodeContext: Calming you, with a smile - he doesn't think you're fearsome at all

19.text: When I kill you, you won't have time to scream.

77.speaker: Tusgront
77.text: When I kill you, you won't have time to scream.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Surely one little peep won't hurt? It can be our little secret.
25.context: NodeContext: Realises what this means - he can pick you off

119.speaker: Tusgront
119.text: Just me and you. I like that. Harmless little secret.
119.context: NodeContext: Realises what this means - he can pick you off

1.speaker: Tusgront
1.text: Just me and you. I like that. Harmless little secret.
1.context: NodeContext: Realises what this means - he can pick you off

33.speaker: Tusgront
33.text: Come in. Take a look around.
33.context: InternalNodeContext: with a smile - he's plotting something, not particularly subtle

41.text: Secrets are good. Violence is better.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Smirking - he's about to kill you

56.speaker: Tusgront
56.text: Secrets are good. Violence is better.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponNodeContext: Smirking - he's about to kill you

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Let me through, or I swear on Gruumsh's eye I'll tear your limbs from their sockets.
91.context: NodeContext: with a smile - not scared in the slightest

7.speaker: Tusgront
7.text: Peace, peace. Your belly burns too hot. It's just a simple alleyway.
7.context: NodeContext: with a smile - not scared in the slightest

70.speaker: Tusgront
70.text: Peace, peace. Your belly burns too hot. It's just a simple alleyway.
70.context: NodeContext: with a smile - not scared in the slightest

21.text: Not if I tear yours out first.

65.speaker: Tusgront
65.text: Not if I tear yours out first.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Thank you for the list - now I know which parts of you to break first.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Look closer at the ring. Try to recall the symbol's meaning.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Look closer at the ring. Try to recall the symbol's meaning.

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *You recall seeing this symbol on crates marked for Nine-Fingers Keene, leader of the Guild. The thug works for her.*

86.speaker: Narrator
86.text: *You recall seeing this symbol on crates marked for Nine-Fingers Keene, leader of the Guild. The thug works for her.*

123.speaker: Tusgront
123.text: Oi. Stop staring. Start walking. Last chance.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I've come from Darkhold. I'm here to join the Zhentarim inside.

80.speaker: Tusgront
80.text: Another one come to take our coin and clog our halls.

89.speaker: Tusgront
89.text: Fine - I'll show you in. Nine-Fingers will give you orders.
89.context: NodeContext: with a sigh, has no choice

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I've come to warn Nine-Fingers. The Zhentarim are planning to kill her.

14.speaker: Tusgront
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Beckoning for player to followNodeContext: Urgent

109.speaker: Tusgront
109.text: Wait. Where's my ring? Did you take my ring?
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Checks hand/notices ring is missing (doesn't need to be shown in close-up)InternalNodeContext: Panicking, accusing

18.speaker: Tusgront
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Getting ready/drawing weaponNodeContext: Furious

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Careful - that's High Harper Jaheira you're speaking to.
116.context: NodeContext: A little fearful but trying not to show it. He's just unwittingly bad-mouthed someone with quite a reputation. At the end, recollecting something interesting.

42.speaker: Tusgront
42.text: Jaheira...? The same Jaheira who burned down Fugal's tea-shop? I saw that fire. Very big. Strange smell.
42.context: NodeContext: A little fearful but trying not to show it. He's just unwittingly bad-mouthed someone with quite a reputation. At the end, recollecting something interesting.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: The fire was his own fault. Bad enough he was adding silkroot to his brews - but he stored it poorly, too.
54.context: NodeContext: Remembering a past vigilante effort of Jaheira's (FOO-gill)

99.speaker: Jaheira
99.text: The fire was his own fault. Bad enough he was adding silkroot to his brews - but he stored it poorly, too.
99.context: NodeContext: Not fully defensive, but correcting the record - she only went to shut down a drugs operation, the fire was entirely incidental

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Nasty little tea man. Sold me some of his rotten leaves once. Made me feel slow, and stupid.
11.context: NodeContext: Vague approval - grateful that Jaheira shut down a narcotic tea shop, annoyed at the memory of having been tricked

94.speaker: Tusgront
94.text: Nasty little tea man. Sold me some of his rotten leaves once. Made me feel slow, and stupid.
94.context: NodeContext: Vague approval - grateful that Jaheira shut down a narcotic tea shop, annoyed at the memory of having been tricked

45.speaker: Tusgront
45.context: NodeContext: Pleased, apparently unaware that he is currently slow and stupid

57.speaker: Tusgront
57.text: Go on, then. If the guildmaster doesn't want you in her hall, she'll tell you so herself.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: You don't recognise me? I'm Nine-Fingers' right hand. She needs me immediately.
124.context: NodeContext: bit flustered, trying to act like he knows who the player is (he doesn't)

92.speaker: Tusgront
92.text: Of - of course! She didn't tell me you were coming.
92.context: NodeContext: bit flustered, trying to act like he knows who the player is (he doesn't)

103.speaker: Tusgront
103.text: Of - of course! She didn't tell me you were coming.
103.context: NodeContext: bit flustered, trying to act like he knows who the player is (he doesn't)

36.text: You think I'm stupid? Well, I think you're dead.

46.speaker: Tusgront
46.text: You think I'm stupid? Well, I think you're dead.

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Hate to cut short conversation with such a handsome fellow, but I have urgent business with Nine-Fingers...
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Indicates his discretion on "dis-creet" - taps side of nose or similarInternalNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" meansNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" means

3.speaker: Tusgront
3.text: I am handsome. Also very strong. And smart. And dis-creet.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Indicates his discretion on "dis-creet" - taps side of nose or similarInternalNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" meansNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" means

83.speaker: Tusgront
83.text: I am handsome. Also very strong. And smart. And dis-creet.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Indicates his discretion on "dis-creet" - taps side of nose or similarInternalNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" meansNodeContext: blushing, posturing. Doesn't really know what "discrete" means

24.speaker: Tusgront
24.text: That's why Nine-Fingers asked me to guard the entrance to the Guildhall.
24.context: InternalNodeContext: Showing offNodeContext: Showing off

137.speaker: Tusgront
137.text: Come. I'll let you in. My pleasure.

4.text: Handsome - not stupid. Stupid is trying to trick me...
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponInternalNodeContext: offended, planning to attack you

111.speaker: Tusgront
111.text: Handsome - not stupid. Stupid is trying to trick me...
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drawing weaponInternalNodeContext: offended, planning to attack you

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'm here to see Nine-Fingers. Get in my way, and you'll lose more than your ring finger.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws up hands - I'm not a threatNodeContext: Pacifying

66.speaker: Tusgront
66.text: No need for violence, friend. Just doing my job.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws up hands - I'm not a threatNodeContext: Pacifying

112.speaker: Tusgront
112.text: No need for violence, friend. Just doing my job.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws up hands - I'm not a threatNodeContext: Pacifying

114.speaker: Tusgront
114.text: People think they can sneak past me: Fists, adventurers, journalists...  Got to be on my guard.

47.text: Big words from such a puny mouth. Let's see how strong you really are.

10.speaker: Tusgront
10.text: Big words from such a puny mouth. Let's see how strong you really are.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Shall I tell Nine-Fingers you refused to let me pass? She'll be very unhappy.

110.speaker: Tusgront
110.text: You're here to see Nine-Fingers? She didn't tell me.

30.speaker: Tusgront
30.text: You're here to see Nine-Fingers? She didn't tell me.

93.speaker: Tusgront
93.text: Always 'Don't let anyone through, Tusgront.' Never 'Here's a list of special guests.' Confusing.

23.speaker: Tusgront
23.text: Come. I'll take you to the Guildhall. Nine-Fingers is inside.

133.text: You won't be telling her anything. 'Cause you'll be dead.

115.speaker: Tusgront
115.text: You won't be telling her anything. 'Cause you'll be dead.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Take me to Nine-Fingers, or I swear on Gruumsh's eye, I'll tear you limb from limb.
72.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

16.speaker: Player
16.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

98.speaker: Tusgront
98.text: Bloody Darkhold Zhents. Getting paid to lurk in our Guildhall. Never work for it.
98.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

9.speaker: Tusgront
9.text: Bloody Darkhold Zhents. Getting paid to lurk in our Guildhall. Never work for it.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

44.speaker: Tusgront
44.text: Guarding the secret entrance? Not good enough for them. But good enough for poor old Tusgront.
44.context: InternalNodeContext: Moaning/Lamenting the boring job he's been given

51.text: Trying to read my thoughts? Read THIS.

87.speaker: Tusgront
87.text: Trying to read my thoughts? Read THIS.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I'm Nine Fingers new muscle. Let me pass, or I'l show you why I was hired.

131.text: *Though you can't shake the feeling you've seen it before, the emblem's purpose is beyond your recall.*

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *Though you can't shake the feeling you've seen it before, the emblem's purpose is beyond your recall.*

26.speaker: Tusgront
26.text: Farlin said to let you in this time. Very insistent.
26.context: NodeContext: With a sigh - he's a bit reluctant, but likes Farlin so will do what she asked

134.speaker: Tusgront
134.text: Wait. You're Farlin's friend... She said to let you in.
134.context: NodeContext: Slowly catching on, then becoming friendly

97.speaker: Tusgront
97.text: Funny little gnome, she is - always laughing at me. Even when I don't joke.
97.context: NodeContext: Oblivious to the fact Farlin is mocking him, thinks she's just a good-natured little gnome

76.speaker: Tusgront
76.text: Stop! What are you doing? Are you trying to sneak past Tusgront?
76.context: NodeContext: Accusing, sense of threat building

73.speaker: Tusgront
73.text: Do not worry. Guild's friends are Tusgront's friends.
73.context: NodeContext: Breaking the tension - he was toying with you. Still a slight hint of threat at the end

82.speaker: Tusgront
82.text: And I don't hurt my friends. Unless they deserve it.
82.context: NodeContext: Breaking the tension - he was toying with you. Still a slight hint of threat at the end

79.speaker: Tusgront
79.text: You have a death wish? I said CLEAR OFF.
79.context: NodeContext: Threatening, spelling out "Clear off" like he's speaking to an idiot

90.speaker: Tusgront
90.text: Go on down. Tusgront is keeping watch.

102.speaker: Tusgront
102.text: Are you lost? Or just stupid? Go. Away.
